name: Rayman: 10th Anniversary Collection
summary: Rayman 10th Anniversary Compilation Pack (Rayman 3 + Rayman M + Rayman Revolution): Triple pack contains: Rayman 3 Rayman M Rayman Revolution Rayman M: Rayman’s world kicks into multiplayer overdrive in this total competition crash course with the cast of Rayman 2. Smoke the competition on mind-bending racecourses, or spark up a lum-flinging firefight in the battle arena.
